transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text: Hello! I'll be conducting a screening interview for the Sales Support Specialist position. Please provide clear answers with specific examples. Let me prepare the questions.

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text: I have 7 questions prepared. Let's begin.

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text:
Question 1 of 7:
Can you describe a time when you had to manage multiple tasks with tight deadlines? How did you ensure everything was completed accurately?

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text: Follow-up: Can you provide an example of a situation where you had to handle several tasks with strict deadlines? What strategies did you use to manage your time and ensure accuracy in your work?

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text:
Question 2 of 7:
Tell us about a situation where you successfully supported a sales team. What was your role and what outcomes did you achieve?

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text:
============================================================
That concludes our questions.

Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. A member of our team will be in touch regarding next steps.

Do you have any questions about the role or the process?
(Type 'DONE' to finish, or enter your questions)
============================================================

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text: Thank you for your questions. The hiring team will address these during the next stage of the process.

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text: Thank you for completing the interview. Please wait while I prepare your evaluation...
